descriptionHtml:
Norilar is a Mer like no other. To put it simply, Norilar is half Altmer, half Bear, and one hundred percent Beefcake. He is skilled in all forms of physical contact, but doesn\'t understand the basics of archery. But then again, who needs arrows when you\'re with Norilar. 

He is waiting for you in the Bannered Mare, in Whiterun. 
(Norilar is a Level 40 Follower skilled in both types of Mele combat, and is exceptionally good at blocking)
author: ClusterShart
